template_input_params.name: ibmc_vm_inst_domain
template_input_params.label: Ibmc Vm Inst Domain
template_input_params.description: The domain for the computing instance.

template_input_params.name: ibmc_vm_inst_hostname
template_input_params.label: Ibmc Vm Inst Hostname
template_input_params.description: The hostname for the computing instance.

template_input_params.name: ibmc_vm_inst_datacenter
template_input_params.label: Ibmc Vm Inst Datacenter
template_input_params.description: The datacenter in which you want to provision the instance. NOTE: If dedicated_host_name or dedicated_host_id is provided then the datacenter should be same as the dedicated host datacenter.

template_input_params.name: ibmc_vm_inst_os_reference_code
template_input_params.label: Ibmc Vm Inst Os Reference Code
